html.p: This course provides examples of some of the capabilities of the latex2edx system, which compiles [mathjaxinline]\LaTeX[/mathjaxinline] into XML code for edX courses.

The focus of this system is on providing sophisticated auto-gradable science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) problems, by extending a document preparation system to provide interactive “answer boxes" for student input and auto-grader responses.
